TyrionLannister.name: Tyrion Lannister
TyrionLannister.question: Is Tyrion Lannister guilty of being a dwarf?
TyrionLannister.description: How does his allegiance to House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
TyrionLannister.quote: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

CerseiLannister.name: Cersei Lannister
CerseiLannister.question: Will Cersei Lannister die at the hands of the valonqar?
CerseiLannister.description: How does her allegiance to House Lannister affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
CerseiLannister.quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.

AryaStark.name: Arya Stark
AryaStark.question: What will Arya Stark say to the God of Death?
AryaStark.description: How does her allegiance to House Stark affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
AryaStark.quote: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell. And I'm going home.

BrienneOfTarth.name: Brienne of Tarth
BrienneOfTarth.question: Will Brienne of Tarth meet her fate?
BrienneOfTarth.description: Do noblewomen have a harder time surviving in Westeros?
BrienneOfTarth.quote: All my life men like you have sneered at me. And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.

SandorClegane.name: Sandor Clegane
SandorClegane.question: Has Sandor Clegane had his last chicken?
SandorClegane.description: How does being a man affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
SandorClegane.quote: Killing is the sweetest thing there is

JaimeLannister.name: Jaime Lannister
JaimeLannister.question: Is Jaime Lannister going to pay for his sins?
JaimeLannister.description: How does his allegiance to House Lannister affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
JaimeLannister.quote: Then he... turned to his pyromancer. Burn them all, he said. Burn them in their homes, burn them in their beds.

SansaStark.name: Sansa Stark
SansaStark.question: Will Sansa Stark meet her fate?
SansaStark.description: How does her allegiance to House Stark affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
SansaStark.quote: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives.

DaenerysTargaryen.name: Daenerys Targaryen
DaenerysTargaryen.question: Will Daenerys Targaryen sit on the Iron Throne?
DaenerysTargaryen.description: How does her allegiance to House Targaryen affect her chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?

JonSnow.name: Jon Snow
JonSnow.question: Is Jon Snow the prince who was promised?
JonSnow.description: How does his allegiance to House Stark affect his chances at surviving in the world of Westeros?
JonSnow.quote: You are a Stark. You may not have my name, but you have my blood.
